name: Lemonan's 2026 Mock Draft 1.0
blurb: Lemonan releases his first written mock draft of the season. Some players will go high, some will go low, and some may not go at all!

name: Lemonan Player Pitching Model
blurb: A new model designed towards finding undervalued pitchers in the current scope of the MLB. Is it effective enough to be a usable metric for MLB teams?

name: SHLIME: Foiling adversarial attacks fooling SHAP and LIME
blurb: I co-authored this machine learning research paper! My role was as a member of the team implementing the model, the lead of the team that analyzed our results and created the finalized figures, and co-led the authoring and editing process of the paper itself.
